sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements alfs, else, stage. and then

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element make describes a make command.
The sub-elements param allow to specify parameters of the make command.
The attribute base allows to specify the directory in which the make will be performed.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.para: The first example is a make without parameter
The second example is a make with a parameter
sect2.programlisting: echo Executing make cd /usr/src/mypackage make install
